page.title: 09ROADS
page.content: Although the roads to and from Little Weighton are in good condition, because we have some of the highest roads in the area, they can be difficult in winter because of snow. This is awkward for many people because they have to travel out of the village to go to work or to the secondary school at Cottingham. There is a 30mph speed limit in the village itself but we do not have a lot of traffic passing through. In 10 minutes we counted 33 cars and lorries, but not all of these were passing through, some were local people driving to the shops and back home again.
